profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.4 Transparency - Transparency group
profile.description: A Group object with an S key with a value of Transparency shall not be included in a form XObject. A Group object with an S key with a value of Transparency shall not be included in a page dictionary
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: A Group object with an S key with a value of Transparency shall not be included in a form XObject. A Group object with an S key with a value of Transparency shall not be included in a page dictionary

error.message: A transparency group is present in a form XObject or page dictionary
